div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 232px; margin-left: 88px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
transition to REPLAYING_EVENTS,
even if there are 0 events to replay

div.div:
transition to CATASTROPHIC_FAILURE
from any state if an irrecoverable error is
encountered

div.div:
* events are created while in FREEZING only until
the node has created an event with its self
signature for the freeze state. after that, the
node will just continue gossiping, in order to
distribute freeze state signatures
